title: October 7th, 2021 - Rick & Bubba Show
description:
Sponsor: Uprising Food - Here at Uprising we are waging war on gut health! We want YOU to finally win. With 95% of people suffering from the fiber gap it's time for the good gut bugs to get some reinforcements. Our weapons of choice, the Uprising™ superfood cube + chip combo, the likes of which this world has never seen before. Between the painstakingly chosen ingredients and the perfectly proportioned recipe, our foods pack an unmatched health boosting + taste buds pleasing combination! GO TO UPRISINGFOOD.COM AND USE CODE RICKBUBBA TO GET $10 OFF THE STARTER BUNDLE. IT'S KINDA LIKE A MINI TRIP TO THE GROCERY STORE MINUS ALL THE UNHEALTHY DISTRACTIONS. AND THEY SHIP DIRECTLY TO YOUR DOOR.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
